main event: A mysterious aerial object was observed over Eagle Grove, Iowa on the evening of February 6, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as circular in shape, bright orange in color, and approximately 50 feet in diameter.
The object was traveling at a high rate of speed and made no sound.
Several witnesses, including Mr. George Bradley and his neighbors, observed the object for several minutes before it rapidly accelerated and disappeared.
No physical evidence or photographic documentation was obtained during this incident.
The report is based solely on the eyewitness accounts provided by the observers.
